entry.title: The most Effective Types of Software Development Life Cycle Models

link.title: The most Effective Types of Software Development Life Cycle Models

entry.summary: The software development life cycle, popularly called SDLC, is a series of phases used in project management that provides a common understanding of the software development process. At 10guru Software Solutions, we are experts at developing SDLC models that suit your project and business requirements.

entry.title: The Benefits of Using a Good Software Development Methodology

link.title: The Benefits of Using a Good Software Development Methodology

entry.summary: A good software development methodology can help to reduce the complexity and risk of software development by providing a structured and disciplined approach to the development process.

entry.title: Introduction to Kafka
entry.summary: Kafka is a real-time data streaming platform that can handle trillions of events per day. Kafka was originally conceived as a messaging queue, but it is now based on an abstraction of a distributed commit log.
